# msatwRangler

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of msatwRangler is to convert microsatellite data from an .xlsx file in the GenAlEx format into .txt files that meet the input requirements of MicroMerge ([Presson et al. 2006](https://www.liebertpub.com/doi/10.1089/cmb.2006.13.1131) & [2008](https://bmcbioinformatics.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/1471-2105-9-317)).

## Installation

You can install msatwRangler with this line of code:

``` {r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("andreasbennetsenboe/msatwRangler")
```
